description:
**map_df.csv**


- *investment_id*

 Same id used in the competition.
- *new_id* 
      仅含数字部分的股票代码
     The converted ticker (Note that it's only the stock id ,for full ticker ,refer to map_info.csv)
- *corr* 
     原始价格与匹配到的股票价格的关联系数。
    The correlation of price between new_id and investment_id

**map_info.csv**

- *investment_id*

 Same id used in the competition.


- *corr* 
     原始价格与匹配到的股票价格的关联系数。
    The correlation of price between new_id and investment_id


- *ticker* 
     股票代码
     The converted ticker (this is the full ticker, you can search  it using Yahoo/Google Finance)

- *CN_Short* *CN_Name* *EN_Name*
    股票中文简称/全名，英文全名
    Chinese Short, Full and English Name of the company


- *Circulating_Market_Value* *Market_Value*
    流通市值/市值。截止到2022年3月5日收盘。以千RMB计。
    Self Explanatory. At close as of 2022/3/25.In thousands RMB.


- *Main_Section*
     行业代码
    Section of this stock.
0001=金融，0002=公用事业，0003=房地产，0004=综合，0005=工业，0006=商业
0001=Finance, 0002=Utilities, 0003=Real Estate, 0004=General, 0005=Industrial, 0006=Commercial
title: ubiquant_stock
